title: Bride and Prejudice's Nathan suffers a wardrobe malfunction
text:
He's not afraid to share graphic details about his sex life with fiancée Codie Lea Lynch on Channel Seven's Bride and Prejudice.

But Nathan Bereyne revealed more than he bargained for on Tuesday's episode, when he accidentally exposed his genitalia on screen.

He was enjoying a romantic boat trip with Codie Lea, 21, when he suffered a hilarious wardrobe malfunction, leaving his partner in stitches.

Whoops! Bride and Prejudice's Nathan suffered a wardrobe malfunction during a romantic boat trip with his fiancée Codie Lea on Tuesday's episode

As he leaned over the edge of the boat to retrieve the buoy, Nathan's shorts seemed to ride up, revealing his private parts.

As soon as Codie Lea realised what had happened, she said: 'Babe, babe... I can see!'

She could barely contain her laughter as she covered her face with her hands and made fun of her husband-to-be.

Oh, dear! As he leaned over the edge of the boat to retrieve the buoy, Nathan's shorts seemed to ride up, revealing his private parts

But instead of being embarrassed, Nathan laughed off the mishap before standing up and quickly rearranging his shorts.

He then clambered back over to Codie Lea, who continued to giggle uncontrollably.

'Well, that made you laugh!' the 25-year-old said, stating the obvious.

How unfortunate! As soon as Codie Lea (left) realised what had happened, she said: 'Babe, babe... I can see!'

It's not the first time the couple have overshared, as Nathan and Codie Lea spoke about their sex trick involving a grapefruit on Monday's episode.

Nathan made the bold confession during a dinner party, explaining how his fiancée had cut a hole in the middle of a grapefruit and pleasured him with it.

'Don't knock it 'til you try it,' Codie Lea said, to which Nathan replied: 'I don't know what else can top it!'
description: He's not  afraid to share graphic details about his sex life with fiancée Codie Lea Lynch on Channel Seven's Bride and Prejudice.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
